class Sensor[source]

Sensor(client)

Sensor.get_all[source]

Sensor.get_all(facility_id)

Retrieves all sensors for a specific facility

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

Sensor.get[source]

Sensor.get(facility_id, sensor_id)

Retrieves a specific sensor for a specific facility

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

Sensor.post[source]

Sensor.post(facility_id, sensor_name, sensor_model)

Creates a new sensor for a specific facility

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

Sensor.put[source]

Sensor.put(facility_id, sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_model)

Creates a new sensor for a specific facility

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

Sensor.delete[source]

Sensor.delete(facility_id, sensor_id)

Deletes a specific sensor for a specific facility
